overview: Jill is the mother to a group of call girls, run by wicked R. Bolla, who uses them for corporate blackmail. The girls range from sweet, sensous Amber Lynn to elegantly debauched Rachel Ashley. Sheri St. Clair soon learns the ugly ins and outs of R. Bolla's set up the hard way!
tagline: The power of Dallas, the lust of Dynasty!
title: Corporate Assets
